Code này có thễ thay đỗi màu nền cho chatbox nhé !

Cho vào CSS :


<code>    #chatbox,#chatbox_footer,#chatbox_members{background-color:#FFF}
</code>

thay #FFF thành màu bạn mún nhé !

css :
<code>

    #chatbox {
    background-image:url(link ảnh);
    background-repeat:repeat;
    background-position:center center;
    }

    .chatbox_row_1,.chatbox_row_2,.chatbox_row_3 {
    background:transparent;
    padding:4px;
    }

</code>

Nền toàn khung Chatbox

<code>
    body.chatbox {
    min-width:550px!important;
    background-color:#fffffff;
    background-image:url(link ảnh);
    margin:0;
    padding:0;
    }

    .chatbox_row_1,.chatbox_row_2,.chatbox_row_3 {
    background:transparent;
    padding:4px;
    }

</code>
